title: UI Guideline
body: Developed using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, UI-Guideline.com serves as an essential resource, drawing over 13,000 monthly visitors seeking UI component guidance.
subTitle: Collaboration with Sergio Ruiz

title: Twon
body: A Next.js application that boosts Twitter engagement through innovative features, offering a unique node-based interface for user interaction.
subTitle: Collaboration with Sergio Ruiz

title: On Time Solution Corp
body: Crafted a responsive company website with Astro and Tailwind CSS that improved customer engagement, leading to an increase in weekly calls.

title: Master Appliance Tampa
body: Revitalized an online presence with a bespoke website, enhancing customer acquisition by 80% through strategic design and development.
